original_text: And Abel, he also brought of the firstlings of his flock and of the fat thereof. And the Lord had respect unto Abel and to his offering:
korean_text: 아벨은 자기도 양의 첫 새끼와 그 기름으로 드렸더니 여호와께서 아벨과 그의 제물은 받으셨으나

sentences.original_text: And Abel, he also brought of the firstlings of his flock
sentences.korean_translation: 아벨도 그의 양 떼에서 태어난 첫새끼를 가져왔고

sentences.original_text: And the Lord had respect unto Abel
